column4: another question: I enabled compiz/desktop cube with unity integration and now I don't know how to get workspace switcher to show up.  Is there one for unity?
best to forget the cube. it and unuty dont play nicely
but... but.. I'm a cube addict :(
cube gas gone the way of bellbottom pants.....
but... I LIKE bell bottoms.  They fit over my boots
you could try ddrescue -  this is a data disk? or a movie disk? comercial disk?
commercial movie dvd.  I just get: Sense: Medium format corrupted
Hmm.. wonder if there could be some little scratch/curruption on the disk thats hard to see
it just seems like a weak point in DVD layouts that if the superblock (or whatever) is damaged, the whole disk appears unusable

alas, ddrescue thinks it is reading bad blocks from the disk, but the disk is not even spinning.  It seems that once the dvd drive itself decides it cannot read the disk, no further operations will work.
but the disk used to work? weird. Not one of those old self-destucting dvd movies they tried to come out with like 5+ yrs ago is it?
nope.  it's a two-part disk.  Disk 1 won't load, but disk 2 does.  go figure
I mean, yes it used to work, and no, it's not supposed to be self-destructing
I got a dvd movie once that was upside down.. lable was on the data side. :)
nice. no, I can confirm this is a movie that used to work
